boardgame.name: La fureur de Dracula
La Furia de Drácula
The Fury of Dracula
Wampir
boardgame.description: The premise of The Fury of Dracula is very similar to Scotland Yard, but with additional rules for combat, events, and encounters. One player secretly controls Dracula while the other three players are Vampire hunters cooperating to locate and defeat him._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dracula must move around the countryside, evading the hunters while leaving minions and encounters for them to uncover in his wake. If he can hide six new Vampires in Europe without the hunters destroying them, the dark prince will be declared victorious and rule the day!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Meanwhile, the hunters try to locate and destroy Dracula before he succeeds in raising an empire of undead Vampires. When they occupy the same space as a dark minion, a vampire, or even Dracula himself, then a combat system is used to determine the results._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will the hunters be able to stem the tide of darkness, or will Europe be consumed by the Fury of Dracula?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameversion: Limited Edition with White Metal Miniatures

listing.notes: In very good condition. The miniatures are well painted. Shipping within the US via insured priority mail. Note to International (non-US) buyers: I must declare actual value on all customs forms. **I will not falsify values on customs forms, no exceptions!**. For International orders, only Paypal is accepted.

All parts present, very good condition. UNPUNCHED sheet of counters, except there is a single wolf counter missing. The original replacement chits are present though, so this won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;t affect the gameplay. Box is unfortunately ripped in one corner. If paying in US Dollars, I only accept Paypal. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;ll also accept £25 Sterling via Paypal, personal cheque, or postal order.
Opened but Unpunched. Some shelfwear on box. The pewter mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;s are handpainted, picture avail on request.

This game has been used, but the game contents are complete and in good and playable shape. Just FYI -- This game has two cards that were misprinted by the company (it happened on one of their print-runs, I guess). What that means is that the Wild Horses card is for Dracula but is marked as a Hunter card. Also, the Hunter card _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Jonathan Harker) says to keep, but is supposed to be _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;play immediately._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; The box is sturdy and in decent shape, but has a moderate amount of scuffing from shelfwear. Playing pieces are plastic, not metal, as the box cover says.
This game was a preorder.
Limited edition with metal miniatures. Complete. Punched. Box in great shape.
Complete, punched, excellent condition. This is the version with the metal figures. Box shows a small amount of wear.
Excellent Condition - complete, Includes Pewter miniatures
This is the English version with the plastic minis. It is missing one counter. Otherwise, everything is there, clean and in good shape. I will charge $7.00 shipping for anywhere in the US.
Metal figures edition. In Excellent shape, played a few times. Complete, no wear on cards, pieces, or board. Figures unpainted. Minimal wear on box and lid, mostly on the corners.
complete and in good condition, 3 pieces painted, plastic figues. Paypal only. No credit cards. Pictures available on request
Excellent condition 100%, some wear to box but excellent inside complete with metal figures

The box is very worn and the map has barely visible aging discolorations. The game was played once. The counters and cards are in plastic zip bags. Overall the components are in very playable condition. U.S. shipping by priority mail.
2nd Ed. GW version with the blue plastic figures instead of the metal ones. Played once. Make me an offer!

Games Workshop version. Punched and played, but all contents complete and in good condition. Board is clean and undamaged. Metal miniatures unpainted. Counters verified complete using photos on BGG. Cards complete; this is not one of the copies with the duplicate/missing cards error. It does, though, have the misprinted _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;wild horses_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; card, which was printed as a hunter card. I wrote _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Dracula_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in ink on the backside cross to fix it. Box is showing its age, with a lot of scuffing and compression creases, but is structurally sound.

Very slight wear to box (slight depression to front). All contents complete. All counters present punched and bagged, as are the 2 dice and the 5 plastic figures. Board and Rules and Screen all in great condition £4.00 postage to UK, e-mail me for EU postage.
Includes painted metal miniatures! Everything is intact and in EXCELLENT condition.
Game is old otherwise complete

Components are complete and in excellent condition. Box has minor shelf wear. It was part of the print run where GW messed up the event card collating so that one sheet of cards was a duplicate. I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t notice until many years after GW quit making the game. So 15 of the 60 event cards have been neatly marked up with blue ink to indicate what card they should have been (see image).
Complete Limited Edition with Pewter Miniatures. Components are unplayed and unpunched. Box shows moderate shelf wear but no split corners.

Pieces are all in good shape, but game worn. Box is solid, but shelf worn. Definitely a playing copy of the game.
